articles.title: Effective immunity to SARS-CoV-2 infection, once developed, could last years, new data hints - Firstpost
articles.description: The study, while still under peer-review, is the most comprehensive and long-ranging study of immune memory to the coronavirus to date.
articles.content:
The study, while still under peer-review, is the most comprehensive and long-ranging study of immune memory to the coronavirus to date.
